name: Blocky -▣- Fish
description:
This Game Was Made For A 1 Hour Game Dev Challenge (Later Updated Graphics)

After Exiting Or Refreshing The Page Your Best Score Will Be GONE!

Controls: -----------------------------------------------------------------------

Space - Swap / Switch Gravity

Space On A Blue Spot - Fish For The Fish And Add It To Your Score
